dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare approach me, pitiful creature?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Show respect to earn respect.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Respect? Hah, you are in no position to demand such things from me.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek a peaceful resolution.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peaceful? I shall only entertain that idea if you can prove your worth.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer you a valuable artifact as a gesture of goodwill.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Artifact? Very well, show me this trinket of yours.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge you to a trial of strength.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A challenge? I accept, prove your strength or be crushed.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no quarrel with you, let us part ways in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: No quarrel? How disappointing, I was looking forward to some sport.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will leave you be if you promise not to harm me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your words bore me, I will do as I please.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Very well, I shall entertain your desire for conflict.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Entertain? You amuse me, prepare for a swift defeat.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your hostility is unnecessary, let us converse civilly.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Civil? I have no need for civility, only dominance.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense fear in your aggression, are you afraid?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Fear? I fear nothing, especially not the likes of you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If it is dominance you seek, then prepare for a challenge.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A challenge? I relish the chance to assert my dominance.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You underestimate me at your own peril.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Underestimate? I highly doubt there is anything you can do to surprise me.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Prepare yourself, for I possess hidden powers beyond your comprehension.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hidden powers? Show me, I shall be the judge of that.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Witness the wrath of nature's fury unleashed upon you!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Fury? Your feeble attempts at intimidation only fuel my amusement.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer you a chance to stand down before facing your inevitable doom.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Doom? The only doom I see is yours, prepare for oblivion.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your arrogance blinds you to the true power that stands before you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Arrogance? I see only weakness in your feeble attempts to intimidate.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Weakness is a facade, prepare to face the consequence of your ignorance.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Consequences? I shall revel in showing you the error of your ways.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your ignorance shall be your downfall, prepare for the inevitable.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Inevitable? I laugh at your misplaced confidence, you will soon learn.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense the stench of decay emanating from your wretched form.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Decay? Ah, you have keen senses indeed, for decay is my essence.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your essence may be decay, but it will not prevail over the purity of life.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Purity of life? Such naivety, life and death dance together in eternal balance.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I stand as the guardian of life, and I shall not allow your corruption to spread.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Guardian of life? Doomed to fail against the unending tide of corruption.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your corruption may be eternal, but so is my resolve to end it.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Resolve? It shall crumble before the unyielding march of decay.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: The stench of decay may linger, but the strength of will shall overcome.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Strength of will? A feeble defense against the inevitable embrace of decay.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: My will may be feeble, but it is resolute in the face of your putrid existence.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Resolute? Your words ring hollow against the suffocating presence of decay.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: The embrace of decay may be inevitable, but so is the cleansing fire of renewal.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Renewal? A fleeting hope in the unending cycle of decay and destruction.
